rounds.comments: (Alex: Now this category has to do with the 1st line in the Bible spoken by a particular individual; we'll give you the line, you have to identify the speaker.)

clues.text: "Let there be light"
"What shall be done to the man that killeth this Phillistine & taketh away the reproach from Israel?"
"We may eat of the fruit of the trees of the garden, but..."
"Go & search diligently for the young child & when ye have found him, bring me word again"
"Hear, I pray you, this dream which I have dreamed"

rounds.text: One of three state capitals with the shortest names--only five letters long
rounds.response: (1 of) Dover, DE, Boise, ID & Salem, OR
